articles.title: WEAVE spectrograph begins study of galaxy formation and evolution - Phys.org
articles.description: More than 500 astronomers from all over Europe, including members of Catalan universities and research centers—the UPC and the ICCUB—have designed and planned a total of five years of operations for the WEAVE spectrograph, a powerful instrument recently insta…
